PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-03902021-05-14DFO,  ,  ,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Atlantic Fishery Regulations, 1985
PrecisRegulations amending the ATLANTIC FISHERY REGULATIONS,1985 in order to (1) establish a yearly close time from January 1 to March 31 so that no person can fish Atlantic mackerel for recreational purposes; (2) set a daily possession limit to 20 Atlantic mackerel that a person can catch and retain; (3) increase the size minimum for possession of Atlantic mackerel to 26.8 cm for commercial and recreational fishing; and (4) put a limit of five fishing lines and a limit of six hooks on a fishing line.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0100 Publication Date: 2021-05-26
AttachmentsAttachment
